p.d: Fadoul has succeeded; at long last he's the new owner of the Melody school! And his profitable project to build a shopping centre finally begins to take shape. He shows his partner, the famous composer David Tayorault, around the site. Directed by: Alain Guikou (Côte d'Ivoire/France, 2020) Cast: Andrea Gouré (Gina), Hicham Meroueh (Hussen Fadoul), Gabriel Zahon (Uncle Bernard), Serge Grah (Lino), Nancy Goulian (Marie), Landry Gnamba (Ethan), Franck Vlehi (Momo) With David Tayorault Genre: dramedy
